about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are a team of passionate developers who want to democratize access to web data.

story.title: Our Story
story.description1: It all started when we tried to build a price monitoring system for a client. We quickly realized that web scraping is a complex technical challenge that requires substantial resources and specialized knowledge.
story.description2: We saw that many companies face the same problems: blocked IPs, systems that don't scale, constant maintenance. We decided to build a solution that solves all these problems in one simple and powerful API.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We want any developer or company to be able to access the web data they need, without worrying about the technical complexity behind it. Web data should be as easy to access as any other API.

items.title: Simplicity
items.description: We believe complex technology should be simple to use. Our API is intuitive and well documented.

items.title: Reliability
items.description: Our infrastructure is built to work 24/7. 99.9%+ uptime and dedicated support.

items.title: Scalability
items.description: Our system grows with your needs. From small tests to millions of daily requests.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: Clear pricing, complete documentation and open communication. No surprises, no hidden costs.
